Politwoops Dataframe

politwoops.Rd

Politwoops is a public database maintained by ProPublica which tracks deleted tweets by public officials

politwoops

Format

A data frame with 1852 rows and 16 variables:

full_name

Full name of account user

user_name

character Twitter handle

twitter_id

double Unique id for Twitter account

party_name

integer User's political party

state

integer User's state of residence

office_title

integer Official Tital

account_type

integer Type of Twitter account. Has three values: campaign, officail, personal

first_name

character First Name

middle_name

character Middle Name

last_name

character Last Name

suffix

character Suffix

bioguide_id

character ID number for user

gender

character gender

fec_candidate_id

character FEC ID number

district

double Congressional district

branch

character Branch of Governemnt

Source

https://www.propublica.org/datastore/dataset/politicians-tracked-by-politwoops

Details

Contains information for the accounts of politicains being tracked by politwoops.
